org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.core

Class FormatterCoreImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.Vector<E>
          • java.util.Stack<Block>
            • org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.core.FormatterCoreImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Block>, Collection<Block>, List<Block>, RandomAccess, org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.BlockBuilder, org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.BlockContentBuilder, org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.FormatterCore, BlockGroup
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockSequence, ContentCollectionImpl, TableOfContentsImpl

    public class FormatterCoreImpl
extends Stack<Block>
implements org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.FormatterCore, BlockGroup

    Implementation of FormatterCore. Can contain for example a parsed OBFL sequence.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
